backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and video/note bookmark storage with strict access control using AccessControl mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup file providing prewritten one‑sentence summaries for many frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light/dark mode and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring all routes with TanStack Router and handling the splash screen before rendering the router.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary component that logs exceptions and shows a reloadable fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/AppLogo.tsx: Logo component that loads a custom logo with fallback to a generated image when missing.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Auth button component enabling Internet Identity login/logout with error handling and react-query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with four routes and highlights the active path.
frontend/src/components/DriveViewer.tsx: Displays Google Drive documents via embed or fallback and supports offline saving and direct opening.
frontend/src/components/SoundPlayer.tsx: Plays a notification sound when triggered and calls an optional end callback.
frontend/src/components/TopicVideoList.t: Shows topic-grouped video lists with selection highlighting and bookmark toggling.
frontend/src/components/YouTubePlayer.ts: Embeds YouTube videos or playlists by converting URLs to embed format.
frontend/src/content/exams.ts: Defines exam sets with IDs, titles, URLs, durations, and coming-soon flags.
frontend/src/content/gk.ts: Provides General Knowledge subject config with notes and detailed topic video lists.
frontend/src/content/iq.ts: Provides IQ subject config with categorized topics and multiple training videos.
frontend/src/content/oldQuestions.ts: Lists old exam questions by paper with IDs, titles, Drive URLs, and coming-soon markers.
frontend/src/content/secondPaper.ts: Defines two SubjectConfig objects containing office management and constitution topics with associated video lists and notes URLs.
frontend/src/content/syllabus.ts: Exports an array of syllabus link objects for different regions and parts, some with comingSoon flags.
frontend/src/content/thirdPaper.ts: Provides SubjectConfig for service management including topics, notes URL, and associated instructional videos.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages local and cloud-synced video and note bookmarks, merging local storage with backend data when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Implements a countdown timer hook with start, stop, reset, and formatted time output.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Loads, stores, and updates user notifications with localStorage persistence and unread count.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineLibrary.ts: Handles offline library items by storing, adding, and removing entries in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers, defines light/dark theme color variables, global styles, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with subject cards, course previews, header actions, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Exam.tsx: Implements exam selection, timed exam viewer, completion screen, and timer logic integration.
frontend/src/pages/NotesBookmarks.tsx: Displays bookmarked notes with delete actions and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/Notifications.tsx: Shows categorized notifications and marks them as read on interaction.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineLibrary.tsx: Lists offline-saved items with open and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/OldQuestions.tsx: Displays old exam papers in tabbed lists and opens selected papers in a Drive viewer.
frontend/src/pages/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows an animated splash screen with logo and tagline while temporarily disabling page scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectContent.tsx: Renders subject videos, notes, search, and bookmarks with a resizable layout and YouTube/Drive viewers.
frontend/src/pages/Syllabus.tsx: Lists syllabus items and opens selected ones in a Drive viewer, with support for coming‑soon entries.
frontend/src/pages/VideoBookmarks.tsx: Displays, searches, and removes bookmarked videos with navigation and auth controls.
frontend/src/types/content.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for videos, topics, and subject configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/videoSearch.ts: Filters topics and videos by keyword, returning only matching topics or videos.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom color system using oklch vars, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements for a Nepali exam-prep mobile app, listing features, issues, architecture notes, and required images.
